original_text: It was revoked on that day, and so the oppressed of the flock who were watching me knew it was the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 당일에 곧 폐하매 내 말을 지키던 가련한 양들은 이것이 여호와의 말씀이었던 줄 안지라

sentences.original_text: It was revoked on that day
and so the oppressed of the flock
knew it was the word of the Lord
